Description
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with this beautiful and deadly battlesuit bottom! Try it with the matching top! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit diesem ebenso schönen wie tödlichen unteren Teil eines Kampfanzuges wie C. Viper aus Street Fighter IV! Kombiniere es mit dem passenden oberen Teil! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with this beautiful and deadly battlesuit bottom! Try it with the matching top! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為C. Viper的戰鬥服 (下)。上下合起來讓您從今天起就是完美小姐！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este traje de combate y siéntete como C. Viper de Street Fighter IV! ¡Combínalo con la parte superior! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour C. Viper de Street Fighter IV avec ce bas de tenue de combat ! Essayez-le avec le haut correspondant ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa C. Viper di Street Fighter IV con la parte inferiore della sua bella e letale uniforme! Provala con la parte superiore! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 바이퍼가 되는 슈트(하의). 상, 하의를 맞추면 당신도 오늘부터 미즈 퍼팩트! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
